meanings.sent1: Maybe we will go to the park tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: I will maybe finish my homework later.
meanings.sent3: Maybe the cat thinks it's a dog!
meanings.sent4: The sun peeked out from behind the clouds, maybe smiling at us.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a surprise party made her eyes light up, maybe with excitement.

meanings.definition: Used to express uncertainty or possibility.
meanings.sent2: She is maybe coming to the party.
meanings.sent3: Maybe the cookies will turn out to be magical!
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled in the night sky, maybe whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent5: The old book held a hidden treasure, maybe waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: A response indicating uncertainty or indecision.
meanings.sent2: She gave a maybe when asked about the movie.
meanings.sent3: The magic eight ball's maybe left everyone wondering.
meanings.sent4: The maybe hung in the air like a question mark.
meanings.sent5: The maybe in her voice hinted at hidden thoughts.
